message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. It's a unique and exclusive item that I'm sure you'll find very appealing. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

I understand that you're looking to save as much as possible, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $900000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and the market demand.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of the product and the fact that you're willing to negotiate.

I understand that you're still looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $875000. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'll counteroffer at $925000. This is the best price I'm willing to offer, and I think it's still a great deal for you considering the product's value.
